apikeys.title: API Key Management
apikeys.description: Manage system API keys and access permissions.

create.title: Create API Key
create.description: Create a new API Key for system access.

delete.title: Delete API Key
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete API Key {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.

status.title: Change Status
status.description: Are you sure you want to change the status of this API Key?
status.enableDescription: Are you sure you want to enable API Key {{name}}?
status.disableDescription: Are you sure you want to disable API Key {{name}}?

archive.title: Archive API Key
archive.description: Are you sure you want to archive API Key {{name}}?
archive.warning: This action will hide the API Key from the list. You can still view archived keys by using the status filter.

view.title: View API Key
view.description: View the complete API key details.
view.warning: ⚠️ Keep your API key secure and do not share it with unauthorized parties. Anyone with access to this key can make requests on your behalf.

bulkDisable.title: Bulk Disable API Keys
bulkDisable.description: Are you sure you want to disable {{count}} selected API keys? This action cannot be undone.

bulkArchive.title: Bulk Archive API Keys
bulkArchive.description: Are you sure you want to archive {{count}} selected API keys? This action cannot be undone.

bulkEnable.title: Bulk Enable API Keys
bulkEnable.description: Are you sure you want to enable {{count}} selected API keys?
bulkEnable.warning: This action will enable all selected API keys. They will be able to make requests to the system.

name.label: Name
name.description: Set an easily recognizable name for this API Key

type.label: Type
type.userDescription: User API keys inherit project scopes from the user. Suitable for personal use.
type.serviceAccountDescription: Service account API keys have custom scopes. Suitable for applications and services.

scopes.label: Scopes
scopes.description: Select the permissions for this service account API key

userID.label: User ID
userID.description: The user ID associated with this API Key

errors.fetchData: Failed to fetch API key data
errors.fetchDetails: Failed to fetch API key details

validation.atLeastOneProfile: At least one profile is required
validation.activeProfileMustExist: Active profile must exist in the profile list

profiles.title: API Key Profiles
profiles.description: Configure model mapping profiles for {{name}}. When an active profile has model mappings configured, the system will automatically map requested models to their target models during API requests.
profiles.allowedChannelsDescription: Select channels that this profile can use. If none selected, all channels are allowed.
profiles.allowedChannelTagsDescription: Select tags to filter channels for this profile. Channels with any of the selected tags will be allowed. If none selected, tag filtering is disabled.
profiles.allowedModelsDescription: Select models that this profile can use. If none selected, all models are allowed.
